sentences.en: Almost from its inception it follows a developmental pattern sharply divergent from that of the zygote.
sentences.cn: 它几乎一开始就遵循与合子显然不同的发育模式.

sentences.en: Also, a developmental approach for searching new ideal circuit elements is presented.
sentences.cn: 同时, 还提出了可用于探索和开发新的理想电路元件的方法和途径.

sentences.en: Conclusions Using nanoparticles as genic carrier a wide developmental foreground.
sentences.cn: 结论纳米颗粒作为基因递送载体具有广阔的发展前景.

sentences.en: During childhood each of us has to navigate a pathway through a series of developmental stages.
sentences.cn: 我们每个人在童年时都要经历和应对不同的成长阶段。

sentences.en: From the developmental point of view, this is not bad.
sentences.cn: 从发展的观点看, 这并不坏.

sentences.en: Higher education is a continuing developmental process .
sentences.cn: 高等教育是一个持续的发展过程。

sentences.en: It is a developmental aesthetics with the combination and statics.
sentences.cn: 茶艺美学是动静结合、不断发展的美学.

sentences.en: It is a necessary and desirable part of the developmental sequence.
sentences.cn: 这是发展过程中不可或缺的一部分.

sentences.en: It is not mechanical and rigid, but transformational and developmental.
sentences.cn: 可以说图像的特征就是艺术观念的晴雨表,个是机械的僵死的, 而是运动、变化、发展的.

sentences.en: The criterion of irreversibility is also not decisive for the interpretation of demarcation of developmental homeostasis.
sentences.cn: 不可逆标准对于解释或区分发育同形作用也是不明确的.
儿童时期的各个发育阶段

sentences.en: The phenomena of cyclophysis and topophysis, are also consequences of developmental homeostasis.
sentences.cn: 周期特性和地方特性这些现象也是发育同形作用的结果.

sentences.en: The product is still at a developmental stage.
sentences.cn: 这种产品仍处于研制阶段。

sentences.en: The small chin deformity was a commen developmental deformity of the jaw.
sentences.cn: 小颏畸形是一种常见的颌骨发育性畸形.

sentences.en: The switchover determined the marketable roomage and developmental orientation in Jiujiang.
sentences.cn: 这种角色换位决定了九江的市场空间和发展方向.

sentences.en: Thoday distinguishes " phenotypic flexibility " from " developmental homeostasis. "
sentences.cn: Thoday把 “ 表型可塑性 ” 与 “ 发育同形作用 ” 区别开.

sentences.en: Vegetative plant growth could be driven by resource acquisition or developmental programs.
sentences.cn: 营养的获取或发育程序可驱动植物的营养生长.
